plot: Trevor Dawson is a twenty-something lovable loser who's slightly lost his direction in life, but after an incident with a cup of coffee and a newspaper everything becomes that little bit clearer.
title: The Trevor Ending Story
plot_es: Trevor Dawson is a twenty-something lovable loser who's slightly lost his direction in life, but after an incident with a cup of coffee and a newspaper everything becomes that little bit clearer.
plot_en: Trevor Dawson is a twenty-something lovable loser who's slightly lost his direction in life, but after an incident with a cup of coffee and a newspaper everything becomes that little bit clearer.
